医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了英格兰跨性别者和非二元性别患者面临的心理健康挑战的程度研究人员评估了英格兰自我记录的精神健康障碍和支持中与性别相关的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-reveals-extent-of-mental-health-challenges-for-transgender-and-non-binary-病人-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Study-reveals-extent-of-mental-health-challenges-for-transgender-and-non-binary-病人-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=002f3267-e134-440b-96c0-728cdb6b1fa7 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 10:03:00 -0500 Study reveals extent of mental health challenges for transgender and non-binary patients in England
治疗神经性疼痛的新方法为数百万人提供了非阿片类药物缓解疼痛的可能性研究人员研究了 sigmoid 2 受体 (σ2R) 或跨膜蛋白 97 (TMEM97) 配体对小鼠神经病理性疼痛模型的选择性活性、它们对伤害性神经元的影响以及 24 小时后的作用机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-approach-to-treating-neuropathic-pain-offers-the-possibility-of-non-opioid-pain-relief-for-millions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/New-approach-to-treating-neuropathic-pain-offers-the-possibility-of-non-opioid-pain-relief-for-millions.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed9fd84a-c8ed-4654-b5e3-ac8299009999 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:39:00 -0500 New approach to treating neuropathic pain offers the possibility of non-opioid pain relief for millions
Arvensis 发布 A-Frame® ReLoad PCR 产品系列创新系统将报废塑料废物减少 77%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Arvensis-releases-A-Framec2ae-ReLoad-PCR-product-range.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Arvensis-releases-A-Framec2ae-ReLoad-PCR-product-range.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71c2b99d-316b-452b-8302-d2cfd5f0efad Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:23:00 -0500 Arvensis releases A-Frame® ReLoad PCR product range

Hamamatsu 推出新型 FDSS-GX：FDSS 系列中性能最高的动能板成像仪Hamamatsu Photonics 宣布推出新型高速动能平板成像仪 FDSS-GX。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Hamamatsu-introduces-the-New-FDSS-GX-the-highest-performance-kinetic-plate-imager-in-the-FDSS-series.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Hamamatsu-introduces-the-New-FDSS-GX-the-highest-performance-kinetic-plate-imager-in-the-FDSS-series.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b20347e-b3c1-472e-a062-195b9c17a82d Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:13:00 -0500 Hamamatsu introduces the New FDSS-GX: the highest-performance kinetic plate imager in the FDSS series
SCIEX 利用 Echoâ MS+ 系统扩展高通量筛选解决方案Echo® MS+ 系统通过将声喷射质谱 (AEMS) 方法引入 SCIEX ZenoTOF 7600 系统，解锁增强的高通量筛选能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SCIEX-expands-high-throughput-screening-solutions-with-Echoa-MS2b-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SCIEX-expands-high-throughput-screening-solutions-with-Echoa-MS2b-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6636a057-5f85-4564-bc37-970cc930bb9a Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:13:00 -0500 SCIEX expands high-throughput screening solutions with Echoâ MS+ system
Discngine 将在 SLAS 2024 上发布其检测目录 - 药物发现高级数据注释的新一步在即将举行的 SLAS 2024 活动期间，制药行业软件解决方案提供商 Discngine 将宣布推出其检测目录。 Discngine Assay 套件的这一新增功能也可作为独立模块提供，旨在集成到任何研究 IT 生态系统中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Discngine-to-release-its-Assay-Catalog-at-SLAS-2024-A-New-Step-in-Advanced-Data-Annotation-for-药物发现.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Discngine-to-release-its-Assay-Catalog-at-SLAS-2024-A-New-Step-in-Advanced-Data-Annotation-for-药物发现.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b0635b3-64e3-4fa2-a306-af4fc2256912 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:02:00 -0500
Festo 在 SLAS 2024 上展示其新型灵活移液解决方案在灵活性的实践演示中，同一支移液器可以分配 20 微升到 20 毫升的液体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Festo-Showcases-Its-New-Flexible-Pipetting-Solution-at-SLAS-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Festo-Showcases-Its-New-Flexible-Pipetting-Solution-at-SLAS-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32d7540d-e642-4b1c-9a2e-c6bc0743f08c Mon, 05 Feb 2024 09:01:00 -0500
研究发现，超过 80% 的索马鲁肽使用者在 12 个月后体重显着减轻https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Over-8025-of-semaglutide-users-achieve-significant-weight-loss-after-12-months-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Over-8025-of-semaglutide-users-achieve-significant-weight-loss-after-12-months-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a190dc01-adc4-4ab5-94c4-ce24273eb42c Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:59:00 -0500 Over 80% of semaglutide users achieve significant weight loss after 12 months, study finds
Veranex 的 SLAS 2024 新闻稿Veranex 是首个专门为医疗技术行业打造的全球服务平台提供商，今天宣布其已收购 T3 Labs，这是一家位于佐治亚州亚特兰大、享有盛誉的临床前实验室。此次收购巩固了 Veranex 扩大其在北方的临床前足迹的承诺https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SLAS-2024-press-release-from-Veranex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/SLAS-2024-press-release-from-Veranex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0463f24c-8c75-4aaf-a1be-f70c552c8e25 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 08:57:00 -0500 SLAS 2024 press release from Veranex
